city.name: Paris
city.description: I have always found Paris to be one of the effortlessly beautiful cities in the world. The Haussmann style of architecture used in the buildings give the city a lively, bright and lovely finish. Its rich culture, high tourist attraction, and overall impression of the people make it the perfect place for a classy vacation.

phrases.englishPhrase: I am from  Zeerust, a small town in South Africa.
phrases.foreignLanguage: Je viens de Zeerust, une petite ville d'Afrique du Sud.

favouriteSubjects.name: Calculus
favouriteSubjects.description: I Studied calculus as a foundation subject for engineering. I found it fascinating as it helped me understand where most of our equations in engineering and physics came from.

favouriteSubjects.name: Structural engineering
favouriteSubjects.description: Structural engineering is the displine of civil engineering concerned with the design and construction of structures such as buildings, roads, and bridges. It is the reason why I took interst in civil engineering because I always wondered how people managed to construct such huge and stable structures.

favouriteSubjects.name: Geotechnical engineering
favouriteSubjects.description: Geotechnical engineering is the discipline of civil engineering that deals with the foundation of structutres, monitors ground actvity and studies soil mechanics. It is my favourite as it is an intergration of engineering, geology, and environmental studies.
